Weekly Planner.description: Plan and prioritize your week with the Minimalist Weekly Planner! Stay organized, hit deadlines, and maximize productivity with this clean Notion template.

Habit Tracker.name: Habit Tracker
Habit Tracker.description: Track and build habits with the Minimalist Habit Tracker! Stay consistent, visualize progress, and achieve your goals with this simple, customizable Notion template.

Notion Starter Pack.name: Notion Starter Pack
Notion Starter Pack.description: Get started with Notion using this handpicked collection of free, beginner-friendly templates created by Mostafa Yasser — a Notion expert and productivity creator. This Starter Pack includes essential tools to help you plan, track, and stay productive in your daily life.

Idea Flow - Team Edition.name: Idea Flow - Team Edition
Idea Flow - Team Edition.description: Elevate your team’s productivity with Idea Flow – Team Edition, a powerful Notion template designed to streamline collaborative idea management. This all-in-one system transforms raw concepts into successful outcomes by fostering discussion, enabling informed decisions, and ensuring seamless execution. Built for clarity and collaboration, it empowers teams to stay aligned and focused.

homeSec.title: Master your student life with StudyHub
homeSec.description: the all-in-one Notion template for tracking everything from classes and tasks to habits and goals.

dashboardSec.title: Your Entire Student Life in One View
dashboardSec.description: Explore how StudyHub brings everything together in one smart dashboard.

essentialsSec.title: Everything You Need — In One Place
essentialsSec.description: Discover the core features that make StudyHub your ultimate academic companion.

0.title: Dashboard Overview
0.description: A sleek central hub that summarizes your academic life: progress, weekly schedule, and quick actions.

1.title: Schedule Section
1.description: Plan your week with a clear and organized breakdown of your daily classes.

2.title: Quick Actions Panel
2.description: Easily add new lessons, instructors, notes, or goals with a single click.

3.title: Progress Tracker
3.description: Automatically updated analytics to help you measure academic performance over time.

4.title: Learning Hub
4.description: Manage all your current and upcoming courses in one smart space.

5.title: To-Do Hub
5.description: Stay on top of your tasks, assignments, and exams with smart date filters like Today, Upcoming, and Missed.

6.title: Review Hub
6.description: Keep all your learning resources and notes organized for easy access and review.

7.title: Reading Side
7.description: Track your current reads and monitor completion rates to stay consistent with your learning goals.

8.title: Flow Section
8.description: Build daily consistency through habit tracking and journaling.

9.title: Mission Hub
9.description: Set long-term academic goals and follow your progress toward achieving them.

10.title: Monthly View
10.description: A calendar view that brings together your exams, tasks, notes, and events all in one place.

11.title: Pre-built Databases
11.description: A modular system with dedicated databases for courses, tasks, exams, instructors, resources, notes, and more.

walkthroughSec.title: A Visual Walkthrough of StudyHub
walkthroughSec.description: Take a closer look at how StudyHub helps you manage your academic life — from planning and studying to tracking progress and setting goals.

0.title: Organize What You Study & When You Study
0.description: View all your courses alongside your weekly schedule. Stay on track with what you're learning and exactly when you need to focus on it — all in one smart layout.

1.title: Structured Learning from Modules to Lessons
1.description: Break down your courses into clear modules and lessons. Easily track what you've covered and what's next — no more scattered materials or missed topics.

2.title: Stay Ahead of Every Deadline
2.description: Track all your assignments, tasks, and exams in one place. With smart filters and reminders, you'll never miss an important date again.

3.title: Read, Capture, and Explore
3.description: Access your reading list, study notes, and valuable resources — all in one place. StudyHub keeps your knowledge organized, searchable, and always at your fingertips.

4.title: Set Goals. Build Projects. Make Progress.
4.description: Turn your academic vision into action. Track long-term goals and manage projects with clear steps, deadlines, and progress indicators.

firstOne.title: Everything About Your Course — In One Place
firstOne.description: Click into any course to access all related tasks, exams, notes, resources, and more. StudyHub connects every detail so you can focus on learning, not searching.

secondOne.title: Track Your Progress Like Never Before
secondOne.description: Get a complete overview of your academic and personal growth — from finished courses and assignments to achieved goals and habits. Stay motivated with real-time progress insights.

databasesSec.title: The Backbone of StudyHub
databasesSec.description: At the heart of StudyHub is a powerful system of interconnected databases designed to organize, connect, and simplify your entire academic journey.

0.title: Courses
0.description: Organize all your academic courses in one place — each with linked lessons, tasks, notes, and progress.

1.title: Modules
1.description: Break down each course into structured modules or units for easier navigation and focused learning.

2.title: Lessons
2.description: Track individual lessons, their topics, progress, and related materials — all connected to your modules and courses.

3.title: Assignments
3.description: Stay on top of every assignment, due date, and submission with smart filters and priority tags.

4.title: Exams
4.description: Plan and prepare for upcoming quizzes, midterms, and finals — with space for dates, study material, and linked courses.

5.title: Instructors
5.description: Manage details for all your professors and instructors, including contact info and courses they teach.

6.title: Schedule
6.description: Visualize your weekly timetable — classes, sessions, and events all organized and easy to access.

7.title: Notes
7.description: Capture and organize your study notes, ideas, and summaries — linked to lessons and courses.

8.title: Resources
8.description: Store useful materials like PDFs, links, and videos, categorized and tagged for easy access.

9.title: Flow
9.description: Build daily consistency with integrated Habits and Journaling — boost focus and self-reflection.

10.title: Books
10.description: Track your current and past readings, with progress bars, categories, and personal ratings.

11.title: Archive
11.description: Move completed courses, lessons, and tasks here to keep your workspace clean and focused.

12.title: Goals
12.description: Define academic and personal goals, track progress, and break them into actionable steps.

13.title: Projects
13.description: Manage long-term assignments, research, or capstone projects — with status, deadlines, and subtasks.

14.title: Tasks
14.description: All your to-dos in one place — assignments, reviews, chores, and more, with flexible filters and views.

pricingSec.title: Choose Your Plan
pricingSec.description: Two options. Same goal: your academic success.

basic.label: Basic
basic.description: A free, simplified version to get you started.

more-advanced.label: Advanced
more-advanced.description: Unlock your full academic productivity potential.

faqs.question: What is Notion?
faqs.answer: Notion is your all-in-one digital workspace — a second brain where you can organize notes, tasks, courses, goals, and everything in between.

faqs.question: How do I get access to the template?
faqs.answer: Once you complete your purchase, you'll instantly receive an email with a link to duplicate the StudyHub template to your Notion workspace.

faqs.question: Do I need a paid Notion account?
faqs.answer: No. You can use StudyHub with Notion’s free plan.

faqs.question: Will I know how to use it?
faqs.answer: Yes. It comes with detailed video tutorials and in-system written guidance to walk you through everything step-by-step.

faqs.question: Is it worth the price?
faqs.answer: Definitely. You save hours building from scratch and get a professionally designed academic dashboard ready to use immediately.

faqs.question: What is your refund policy?
faqs.answer: You can request a refund within 14 days of purchase following the Marketplace refund policy.

faqs.question: Still have questions?
faqs.answer: Email me at contact@mostafayasser.com or DM me on Twitter anytime.

Idea Flow - Solo Edition.name: Idea Flow - Solo Edition
Idea Flow - Solo Edition.description: Transform your ideas into actionable outcomes with Idea Flow – Solo Edition, the ultimate all-in-one system for managing and organizing your personal ideas. Designed for simplicity and clarity, this Notion template ensures no idea gets lost by guiding you through structured stages—from raw thoughts to completed projects.

Notion Me.name: Notion ME
Notion Me.description: Create a professional personal homepage using Notion. Notion Me is a clean, elegant template designed for creators, freelancers, and professionals who want to showcase their identity, services, and latest work — all in one place.

walkthroughSec.description: Take a closer look at how Second Brain helps you manage your entire life — from organizing tasks and goals to tracking habits, ideas, and finances.

0.title: From Vision to Action

homeSec.title: Take control of your money with FinanceHub

dashboardSec.description: Track every detail — income, expenses, debts, taxes, goals, wishlist, and more — all from a single powerful dashboard.

essentialsSec.title: Everything You Need — In One Place
essentialsSec.description: Discover the powerful features that make FinanceHub your complete system for managing money, goals, budgets, and financial clarity.

8.title: Manage Debts & Liabilities

9.title: Tax Records
9.description: Stay tax-ready with organized records, due date tracking, and payment history in one place.

11.description: Filter and analyze your financial activity instantly (today, this week, this month) with one click.

12.description: Adapt and customize everything to fit your unique financial lifestyle and evolving goals.
